page.title: 05Our Village-Shopping.
page.content: I live on the Hamsteels Estate and I go to the Catholic school at Newhouse by bus.I also occasionally go to the village shops by bus.In our village you can buy the following_postal order,washing powder,tennis racquet,fresh fish,cauliflower,spin dryer,margarine,cigarettes,petrol,coff ee,newspapers,apples,eggs,paint,bread ,potatoes,sweets,toothpaste,gloves, fresh meat,tools,T.V.and radio.You cannot buy shoes new and old cars, carpets,furniture,records and certain clothes. Our's is an average sized village with many small shops selling useful things.It has a smallish newsagent, full of sweets,newspapers,magazines, cards,glue,and nuts and bolts.You enter the shop through a glass door , and the articles are spaced around a box shaped room.
